mchorse.mappet.client.gui.utils.graphics

Class Graphic

  • java.lang.Object
    • mchorse.mappet.client.gui.utils.graphics.Graphic

  • public abstract class Graphic
extends java.lang.Object
    Graphic element.

    This is a base interface for all graphic elements that are being constructed by UIGraphicsComponent. Besides storing extra information per a type of graphic, every graphic has position and relative measurements (just like UIComponent has).

      • x

        public Graphic x(int value)
        Set X in pixels relative to parent component.

      • rx

        public Graphic rx(float value)
        Set X relative in percents to parent component. Passed value should be 0..1, where 0 is fully left, and 1 is fully right.

      • rx

        public Graphic rx(float value,
                  int offset)
        Set X relative in percents to parent component with offset. Passed value should be 0..1, where 0 is fully left, and 1 is fully right.
        Parameters:
        value - Percentage how far into X.
        offset - Offset in pixels (can be negative).

      • y

        public Graphic y(int value)
        Set Y in pixels relative to parent component.

      • ry

        public Graphic ry(float value)
        Set Y relative in percents to parent component. Passed value should be 0..1, where 0 is fully top, and 1 is fully bottom.

      • ry

        public Graphic ry(float value,
                  int offset)
        Set Y relative in percents to parent component with offset. Passed value should be 0..1, where 0 is fully top, and 1 is fully bottom.
        Parameters:
        value - Percentage how far into Y.
        offset - Offset in pixels (can be negative).

      • w

        public Graphic w(int value)
        Set width in pixels.

      • rw

        public Graphic rw(float value)
        Set width relative in percents to parent component. Passed value should be 0..1, where 0 is element will be 0% of parent component's width, and 1 is 100% of parent's component width.

      • rw

        public Graphic rw(float value,
                  int offset)
        Set width relative in percents to parent component with offset. Passed value should be 0..1, where 0 is element will be 0% of parent component's width, and 1 is 100% of parent's component width.
        Parameters:
        value - Percentage of how wide relative to parent component.
        offset - Offset in pixels (can be negative).

      • h

        public Graphic h(int value)
        Set height in pixels.

      • rh

        public Graphic rh(float value)
        Set height relative in percents to parent component. Passed value should be 0..1, where 0 is element will be 0% of parent component's height, and 1 is 100% of parent's component height.

      • rh

        public Graphic rh(float value,
                  int offset)
        Set height relative in percents to parent component with offset. Passed value should be 0..1, where 0 is element will be 0% of parent component's height, and 1 is 100% of parent's component height.
        Parameters:
        value - Percentage of how tall relative to parent component.
        offset - Offset in pixels (can be negative).

      • xy

        public Graphic xy(int x,
                  int y)
        Set X and Y in pixels relative to parent component.

                   float y)
        Set X and Y in pixels in percentage relative to parent component.

      • anchor

        public Graphic anchor(float x,
                      float y)
        Set X and Y anchor point of this graphic object individually.

      • anchorX

        public Graphic anchorX(float x)
        Set X anchor point of this graphic object.
        Parameters:
        x - A factor 0..1, where 0 is the left edge, 1 is the right edge.

      • anchorY

        public Graphic anchorY(float y)
        Set Y anchor point of this graphic object.
        Parameters:
        y - A factor 0..1, where 0 is the top edge, 1 is the bottom edge.
